parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The key of the tag that is added to the agent configuration policy.

parameters.name: TagExt
parameters.description: The extended tag of the agent configuration policy.

parameters.name: TagValue
parameters.description:
The value of the tag that is added to the agent configuration policy.

*   major
*   advanced
*   basic

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the server that you want to query.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUID of the asset. You can specify a maximum of 500 UUIDs at a time.
